title: LangChain vs Segment Anything Model (SAM): Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare LangChain vs Segment Anything Model (SAM). See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between LangChain and Segment Anything Model (SAM)? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: LangChain vs Segment Anything Model (SAM)
paragraphs: LangChain (nlp) is Framework for developing applications powered by language models with tools for chaining prompts, agents, and memory management.. It's known for LLM, Prompt Chaining, Agents.

Segment Anything Model (SAM) (computer vision) is Meta's revolutionary promptable image segmentation model with zero-shot generalization capabilities.. Users choose it for Meta, Segmentation, Zero-shot.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: LangChain: LLM application development, Prompt chaining, Agent frameworks
Segment Anything Model (SAM): Zero-shot segmentation, Promptable interface, 1.1B mask dataset

verdict: Both LangChain and Segment Anything Model (SAM) are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: LangChain for LLM, Segment Anything Model (SAM) for Meta.
